definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure.
sentences.chinese: 我開始可是認爲美洲豹肯定贏的。

sentences.english: The leopard was Nature, and he was being natural.
sentences.chinese: 美洲豹象徵着自然，它在那裏顯得很自然而已。

sentences.english: The Jaguar supercomputer can process up to 2.3 quadrillion calculations per second.
sentences.chinese: 這臺美洲豹超級計算機能達到每秒計算23萬億次。

sentences.english: As soon as it went underneath the light, I saw that it was a cougar.
sentences.chinese: 當它走到燈光下的時候我纔看出那是隻美洲豹。

sentences.english: These days, the human-handprint theory of the leopard's spots has fallen out of favour.
sentences.chinese: 最近，美洲豹斑點的手印理論已不合口味。

sentences.english: The tapir's main enemies are members of the cat family, such as tigers and jaguars.
sentences.chinese: 貘的主要敵人是諸如老虎和美洲豹之類的貓科動物。

sentences.english: there were enough pumas out West.
sentences.chinese: 在西部有足夠多的美洲豹。

sentences.english: There is a new species of leopard out there in the rainforest of Borneo.
sentences.chinese: 在婆羅州有一種新的美洲豹在熱帶雨林中被發現。

sentences.english: Instead, a brick smashed into the Jag 's side door!
sentences.chinese: 取而代之的，是一塊磚頭砸到了他的“美洲豹”側門。

sentences.english: Being able to pronounce that might impress a cougar .
sentences.chinese: 能發音，可能留下深刻的印象一美洲豹。

sentences.english: The only difference between panthers and leopards is color.
sentences.chinese: 黑豹與美洲豹唯一的不同，只是膚色。

sentences.english: But the panthers have adapted to living in the Florida swamps.
sentences.chinese: 但佛羅里達美洲豹已經適應了佛羅里達沼澤地的生活。

sentences.english: Pumas are large, cat-liked animals which are found in America.
sentences.chinese: 美洲豹產於美國，是一種大型的貓科動物。

sentences.english: They include the Florida panther, the American crocodile and the West Indian manatee.
sentences.chinese: 其中包括佛羅里達美洲豹，美洲鱷和西印度海牛。

definition: bald eagle (Haliaeetus leucocephalus), the national bird of the United States
